markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">
[Perseis's Precautions](/Spells.aspx?ID=834)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Prediction" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=132" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 123

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

Leaving nothing to chance, you weave divinatory precautions against an ambush, alerting the target to danger. Once during the duration of this spell, the target can roll one Perception, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4), [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8), [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11), or [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) initiative roll twice and take the better result, after which the spell ends. The strain of staying so prepared is too much for a mind to handle for long; the target is temporarily immune to this spell for 24 hours once the spell ends, whether they used the initiative benefit or not.
name: Perseis's Precautions

summary_markdown: Leaving nothing to chance, you weave divinatory precautions against an ambush, alerting the target to danger.
text: Perseis's Precautions Three Actions Source PFS Guide pg. 123 Traditions Arcane, Occult Cast material, somatic, verbal Range touch Duration 10 minutes --- Leaving nothing to chance, you weave divinatory precautions against an ambush, alerting the target to danger. Once during the duration of this spell, the target can roll one Perception, Arcana, Crafting, Lore, Occultism, or Society initiative roll twice and take the better result, after which the spell ends. The strain of staying so prepared is too much for a mind to handle for long; the target is temporarily immune to this spell for 24 hours once the spell ends, whether they used the initiative benefit or not.
